show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content: Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips play segments of  Project Censored the Movie: Ending the Reign of Junk Food News and... <!--more--> discuss the forthcoming book, Censored 2014: Fearless Speech in Fateful Times.  Both can be pre-ordered on line at:  WWW.Projectcensored.org
